title: Flickering - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Bullying   Cold Love Interests   Coming of Age   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Mute Character   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Quiet Characters   Slow Romance   Wealthy Characters
author: Lěng Shān Jiù Mù   冷山就木
description:
The love story of a gloomy little mute boy and his sunshine boy.

A sweet and sour campus life story. Daily school life goes by slowly and steadily. Gong, who is mute, is unable to talk in the first parts of the story, but later on, he will be able to improve.>
